item.title: Automating Managed Identity Integration for SQL Server with Terraform and Azure DevOps
item.description: If your security requirements mandate integrating managed identities on your Azure resources with a SQL Server, achieving this with Terraform can be challenging due to limitations reported in the Microsoft’s documentation… but let me show you how can achieve that!
